argument.name: panel
argument.description: The name of the panel to activate. Multiple nested panels (such as a panel card in a panel layout) can be activated by using a ":" to separate names.

argument.name: animation
argument.description: Whether or not to animate the panel layout transition.

page.description: Activate a child panel of the layout.
